# Matheus Moura

Hello! I'm Matheus Moura, student from Salvador-BA, Brazil, currently in the 7th semester of the Computer Engineering course. I had my first contact with programming languages in 2021, when I started to learn C, then I decided to learn Python and Java and now I will start to learn about HTML, CSS and JavaScript. My favorite hobbies are games, listening to music and (obviously) programming.
